definitions.text: a stiff fiber (coarse hair or filament); natural or synthetic
be in a state of movement or action
examples: The room abounded with screaming children
It was a sight to make one's hair uprise!

definitions.text: have or be thickly covered with or as if with bristles
react in an offended or angry manner
examples: He bristled at her suggestion that he should teach her how to use the program
